attributes.additional_details:
Do you know that our government pays £1.2billion in handouts to energy companies to produce electricity from wind farms.
These wind farms are meant to reduce our electricity costs, Only work at around 24% of capacity.
They cannot produce energy when there is only a little wind or if strong.
 Now the big six have announced nearly 10% Increase to heat our homes this winter.

until we the public stand up & be counted, we will be robbed for years to come.

either we Need energy prices capped or we withdraw funding for windfarms
